Before seeing how does chiropractic care boost the immune system, let's first have a look at how our immune system functions to keep us healthy. Made up of various organs, cells and proteins, [the immune system](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK279364/) has a vital role in keeping us not only healthy, but also alive. Throughout our entire life, it keeps our bodies safe from harmful substances, viruses, germs or cell changes that could make us ill. A weakened immune system leads to what medical doctors refer to as [immunodeficiency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Immunodeficiency#:~:text=Immunodeficiency%2C%20also%20known%20as%20immunocompromisation,affect%20the%20patient's%20immune%20system.). Immunodeficiency is a state in which the immune system's ability to fight infectious diseases or cancer is compromised, or entirely absent, and it usually appears when the body stops producing enough immune cells, or those cells do not function properly.
